page.title: 19ECOLOGY / Weather
page.content:
Children in Class 5, at Clipston School decided to set up a weather station and record the weather for the month of June 1985. A data collection sheet was devised and information was collected and recorded every day at approximately 1:30. When all the information was available the children drew bar charts and line graphs to represent their findings.
The average rainfall in 24 hrs was 4.75mm. The average temperature throughout the month was 18 degrees Centigrade. The prevailing winds blew from the E or NE. The average wind speed was 3 mph.
